titles: An excellent medley, which you may admire at (without offence) for every line speaks a contrary sense. The tune is, Tarletons medley.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,
notes: Date of publication suggested by Wing.
Verse: "In summer time when folks make hay ..."
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library and the British Library.
